price: ហើយចូរពួកអ្នកធ្វើសង្គ្រាមក្នុងផ្លូវអល់ឡោះ ហើយ ត្រូវដឹងថាៈ ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ អល់ឡោះមហាឮ មហាដឹង។
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: waqātilū fī sabīli al-lahi wa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha samīʿun ʿalīmun
